verses.verse: And the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H7157>Kirjathjearim<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H5927>fetched<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H41>Abinadab<s%> in the <S%H1389>hill,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H3117>while<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H7157>Kirjathjearim,<s%> that the <S%H3117>time<s%> was <S%H7235>long;<s%> for it was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5091>lamented<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you do <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts,<s%> then <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> and <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> you, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him <S%H905>only:<s%> and he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H1168>Baalim<s%> and <S%H6252>Ashtaroth,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H905>only.<s%>
And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6908>Gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4708>Mizpeh,<s%> and I will <S%H6419>pray<s%> for you to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they <S%H6908>gathered<s%> together to <S%H4709>Mizpeh,<s%> and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H8210>poured<s%> it out <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4708>Mizpeh.<s%>

And when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H6908>gathered<s%> together to <S%H4708>Mizpeh,<s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H2790>Cease<s%> not to <S%H2199>cry<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> for us, that he will <S%H3467>save<s%> us out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H2461>sucking<s%> <S%H2924>lamb,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> it for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering <S%H3632>wholly<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>heard<s%> him.

And as <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was <S%H5927>offering<s%> up the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7481>thundered<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> on the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H1949>discomfited<s%> them; and they were <S%H5062>smitten<s%> before <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out of <S%H4709>Mizpeh,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, <S%H5704>until<s%> they came <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H1033>Bethcar.<s%>

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> it <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%> and <S%H8129>Shen,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it <S%H72>Ebenezer,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Till <S%H5704>now<s%> <S%H2008><s%> has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> us.

So the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H3665>subdued,<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> into the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was against the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>

And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H7725>restored<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> from <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> even to <S%H1661>Gath;<s%> and the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> thereof did <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> And there was <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

And he <S%H1980>went<s%> from <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year<s%> in <S%H5437>circuit<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H4709>Mizpeh,<s%> and <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H4725>places.<s%>

And his <S%H8666>return<s%> was to <S%H7414>Ramah;<s%> for <S%H8033>there<s%> was his <S%H1004>house;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
